attributes.action: Benefit cuts & basic human rights (this effects everyone)
attributes.additional_details:
We the British people ask for the following;

- We ask that the ESA/DLA are kept at the same rate.those in receipt are assessed by their doctors.
-We ask that the bedroom tax is not put into place.
-We ask that child benefit is not capped at two but three children.
-We ask that changes made to the amount of child benefit be fairly reduced at the same rate across all households who earn over £50,000.
-We ask that housing benefit is not abolished for under 25s.
-We ask that all benefits are paid at the same rate to all British citizens regardless of age as it is ageism not to.
-Cuts should not be made to the education system for British citizens. However foreign students should pay for at least half of their own education.
-Benefits should not be paid to people who emigrate to Britain for their first year of residency.
-All yearly bonuses regardless of job should be capped at £10,000
-Minimum wage should be raised to £6.30 an hour
